comments:
as  I tested the class GlobusJob (the test is GlobusJob_PDETest in Plug-in eu.geclipse.globus.test), I detected two possible bugs.

1. getJobDescription failed with an error

	2. GetSubmissionTime gave a null because a ParseException which shall be not issued. I create the GlobusJob object using this .globusjob file: 
#g-Eclipse Globus job file
#Mon Oct 01 10:59:20 CEST 2007
SubmissionTime=Mon Oct 01 10\:59\:20 CEST 2007
JobID=https\://ce-fzk.gridka.de\:20070/17704/1191229160/
RslFile=/TestGridProject/myfile.rsl

So, the time is in.
